betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThings are going to get quite elaborate by the end of this chapter. It may be a good idea to start working on all uncompleted side content available so far. It should be a good way to take a break from Vethea progression too!

§fYup, I dipped my feet in the waters of Fractal might. Now I know, at least partially, what is coming.
I won't just have to fully enter this vast and deep ocean, I will have to reach its bottom.
While I still do not know what this will entail, and I likely won't until I get there, I can say that a sacrifice will be required, and something will need to be let go.
Well, I already have to let go...
Sleep, a sleep of nighmares, a sleep of nightmares, a sleep of helplessness, a sleep of fear, a sleep of solitude.
I must face my own self, or whatever form my own essence takes at the layer of recursion. I must know who I am to become before I try to become it.
It it time to leave it all behind, it is time to start swimming down, deeper and deeper. And deeper still.
